snippet.title: Sonic Riders Tournament Edition 1.2 & HD Texture Pack Release Trailer
snippet.description:
With the greatest pleasure, I present to you years worth of the team's efforts! "Sonic Riders Tournament Edition 1.2" & "Sonic Riders HD Texture Pack 1.0" is available for download right now! There are many more changes present in the mod. Character balance, tweaked mechanics, helpful features, and even more additional content! You can see every we changed in great detail by browsing our website here: https://sites.google.com/view/sonic-riders-te/home
It's important to mention that the mod and the texture pack are separate to give people the choice of whether or not they want to use it. Additionally, the texture pack also works on vanilla Riders. If you don't care for the mod you can still play riders with our high res 2D assets!

Grab the mod in our discord: https://discord.gg/GPgZdKq

Download ONLY the recommended preset for texture pack:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13YFSC4dRwJOx_paBI8PCiDR_6zaWjae-?usp=sharing

Download the "Marble Crunch" version only (ONLY THE REDRAWN ASSETS IN THIS PACK)
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1bp94_wCRveGkWyZGC-Ps5X28Yt6bWdiR

Download all content in the texture pack:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kNIfhF1yWmiD6T6VadViQzC_x5wxyn0v/view?usp=sharing

The beautiful animation you saw was actually specifically commissioned for this video. It was done by HorrorFreak and the backgrounds were drawn by Slasharu. Please show them support for their efforts!

HorrorFreak links:
https://twitter.com/HorrorFreakHC
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmiIASFzguw6Ie7iwqdyRBw?

Slasharu link:
https://twitter.com/Slasharu
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgjqsvrB0v6Ug8rft5tBcLQ

This video was edited by The Protagonist and Odd-Eyes Von. Here are their links:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpaVn6Iu5_MHVIwAaTlWIbw
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZjPI5jHPfNgplmS0Lj1rZA

Show the rest of the team some support:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7-Y78LtYwtrNY8AdFGonew
